tool_description:
Ensure you have a high percentage of right-first-time document collection and a straight pass-through by validating in real-time that the documents your customers submit are the same you expect them to be.

The Document Validation API enables you to qualify the images before your customers submit them to you, in terms of classification of the document, clarity of document, and whether a document has a face present on it or not.
title: Document Image Validation

api_list.name: Document Image Validation
api_list.description:
Ensure you have a high percentage of right-first-time document collection and a straight pass-through by validating in real-time that the documents your customers submit are the same you expect them to be.

 

The Document Validation API enables you to qualify the images before your customers submit them to you, in terms of classification of the document, clarity of document, and whether a document has a face present on it or not.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://document-image-validation.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/validate/document"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-image-validation.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

import requests

url = "https://document-image-validation.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/validate/document"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
